directions: Stir brown rice flour, white rice and sweet sorghum flour, chickpea flour, yeast, xanthan gum, and salt together in a large bowl. Stir eggs, soy nut butter, honey, and apple cider vinegar into the flour mixture; add water and almond milk and stir. Transfer mixture to the pan of your bread machine.
Select Basic or White Bread setting, and press Start.
ingredients: 3/4 cup gluten-free white rice and sweet sorghum flour
title: Gluten-Free and Dairy-Free Bread
